titles.title: EDIBLE Act
Eliminate Dogmatic Interference by Bureaucratic Lunch Extremists Act
To prohibit the Federal Government from issuing or enforcing certain requirements for schools relating to food.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Early Childhood, Elementary, and Secondary Education.

committee.subcommittee: Early Childhood, Elementary, and Secondary Education
committee.name: House Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 9/18/2014--Introduced. Eliminate Dogmatic Interference by Bureaucratic Lunch Extremists Act or the EDIBLE Act - Prohibits the federal government from issuing or enforcing requirements for elementary or secondary schools with respect to food for which there is or will be a cost not covered by the federal government.
